description:
Company Description

Embrace Growth in Los Angeles, CA, is dedicated to creating communities of integrity, contribution, and wisdom that leave a legacy of Love for future generations. The organization focuses on shifting patterns of thinking to inspire awareness and resolve challenges permanently. Embrace Growth's practices and ideas have been proven effective in relationships and with people from diverse backgrounds.


Role Description

This is a part-time on-site role for an Office Manager at Embrace Growth in Los Angeles, CA. The Office Manager will be responsible for communication, administrative assistance, managing office equipment, providing excellent customer service, and overseeing office administration tasks on a daily basis.


Qualifications

  • Communication and Customer Service skills
  • Administrative Assistance and Office Administration skills
  • Proficiency in managing office equipment
  • Experience in a similar role is preferred
  • Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
  • Attention to detail and problem-solving skills
  • Knowledge of basic office software and tools
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment

bilingual ( fluent in English & Farsi )
